channel.title: Butler/Possessor Bug in v1.1.1b
channel.description:
I was possessor, I took control of myself to attack another player (by accident, I forget my own number and don't pay attention sometimes). The player I attacked was a Butler who partied, but I killed him. He got the message that he occupied all visitors, followed by the message that he'd been killed.
His party should have occupied me.
Be possessor, control yourself to attack a partying butler, butler will die.

item.title: Butler/Possessor Bug in v1.1.1b
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Possessor is occupation immune though, right? I know party was buffed to prevent some things, but as you are being forced to attack, instead of just visiting, I think it ignores the occupation

Read full topic

item.title: Butler/Possessor Bug in v1.1.1b
item.dc:creator: Audiyon
item.description:
I was possessor, I took control of myself to attack another player (by accident, I forget my own number and don’t pay attention sometimes). The player I attacked was a Butler who partied, but I killed him. He got the message that he occupied all visitors, followed by the message that he’d been killed.

His party should have occupied me.

Be possessor, control yourself to attack a partying butler, butler will die.
